import requests

url = "https://soccer-app4.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures?league=39&season=2020"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soccer-app4.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
